      • findOrCreatePeer

        public static Peer findOrCreatePeer(java.lang.String announcedAddress,
                                    boolean create)
        Find or create a peer The announced address will be used for the host address if a new peer is created
        Parameters:
        announcedAddress - Peer announced address
        create - TRUE to create the peer if it is not found
        Returns:
        Peer or null if the peer could not be created
